short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate & Download bulk Freepik images with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freepik.com allows user to generate images based on prompt and then download generated images. 
On paid plans, Freepik.com allows a large volume images to generate and download.
For that user requires to do a lots of clicks.

This extension improves the user experience of  image generation and downloading from Freepik.com by allowing user to set number of images to download and the prompt. 
The extension then take cares of the rest by using the already provided functionalities of the website and chrome browser's default behaviour.
It uses the user provided prompt and downloads target amount of images given that user has enough credit.

Free and Premium download options are added. Premium option works only with premium account.
